**See, for example, Matthew 5:22, 29–30, 8:11–12, 13:36–50, 18:8–9, 23:29–33, 25:31–46, Mark
3:28–29, 9:42–48, Luke 16:19–31, 2 Thessalonians 1:5–10. 
†Readers of Augustine’s Confessionswill recall that he cites this incident from his childhood to
illustrate his wickedness. (ConfessionsII.iv.9)
